name: Bar Time
description:
You stayed up way to late drinking with your buddy, but wait! Its MONDAY! You gotta try to work without your boss finding out! 

W, A, S, D to Move
Enter or Space to clear Title Screen and End Screen
Try to keep the bars full as you run all over the office in a drunken state!
Oh and try not to get caught being Drunk at work Dood!

I ran into soooo many unexpected problems with this one, one of the main ones being clearly not understanding how the resolution effects the game window. This is something I still need to fix, but I'm happy at this point that it 
seems to work in full screen.

My plan was probably a bit overly ambitious but pretty thorough and other then sound essentially getting scrapped everything else got done in about the other we had planned out.


A BIG Thanks to Stag#6886 for helping a lot with the pixel art for the game!
and another thanks to BunnyehButt#4939 for helping during the planning section!
Streamed here: 

Fair warning it went crazy
